arts.ttl: Barnsley grab last-minute winner at Burton
Man Utd predicted XI for Crystal Palace clash as thumping Barnsley win provides huge clue
arts.sum: After heading into the international break off the back of consecutive defeats to Brighton and Liverpool, United have emerged from the break with two wins during which there were 10 goals scored and none conceded

arts.ttl: Five goalscorers to watch out for this weekend: Burton's Orsi to trot up
arts.sum: Another cracking weekend of football action is set to unfold across Europe and Steve Davies has five potential goalscorers to look out for, including in-form Danilo Orsi.
